references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, which is adapted by the current research for text-to-mesh generation, making it a foundational component.
This paper introduces MVDream, a multi-view diffusion model used as a teacher to ensure view consistency and is leveraged in the proposed Progressive Rendering Distillation.
This paper is important because it presents Dreamfusion, a method of using 2D diffusion models for text-to-3D generation which the current research builds upon and compares against.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian Splatting for Real-Time Radiance Field Rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting, a technique used for rendering and compared against in the current paper, offering an efficient rendering approach.

references.paper_title: LoRA: Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA for parameter efficient adaptation, a key component in the current study for modifying convolution blocks and cross-attention layers, making adaptation more efficient.
